about_the_game:
The game is still in development and is therefore subject to potential changes.
Feel free to follow us on our Discord server and add the game to your wishlist!

A night of nightmare

Appearances is a single-player first-person horror and puzzle game where you play as little Suzy, who is being cared for by her babysitter in the family villa. In the middle of the night, you hear a strange, piercing sound that seems specifically designed to wake you up. Your first instinct is to find your babysitter, but the night can be terrifying for a child with a vivid imagination. The music box your grandmother made for you is the best source of comfort, but you'll soon discover that something supernatural is lurking nearby, and this music box serves a purpose beyond simply playing music. It's up to you to uncover your family's past and put an end to these nightmarish apparitions.

Parallel worlds

Evolve into a contemporary family villa and navigate your way through this labyrinth of hallways and rooms. Nevertheless, following a mysterious blessing, you may gain access to a parallel world inhabited by the entity that haunts you. A shift in ambiance and new pathways will become available to you. Seize these opportunities to escape and uncover additional secrets.

Music box

Your grandmother's music box, its music is the only way to pull you out of your nightmares. Use this music box to locate the entity following you during this eventful night, and don't get caught.

Hidden secrets

Uncover your family's secrets and reveal the truth by solving puzzles. However, always remember that you are just a child relentlessly pursued by an entity you can't comprehend.

Psychological Horror

This game is inspired by masterpieces of cinematographic and video game horror but also escape games!

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti ou ATI Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A single-player, first-person horror game. Little Suzy finds herself alone in the family villa on a strange and eerie night, but something lurks in the surroundings, seemingly having marked Suzy as its prey... Uncover the hidden secrets to grasp the truth behind your torment
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
